A

addExtraBags(Scanner, int, int, double, double, double) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
addExtraBags Description: The method will display how many bags the user has left and then ask how many of the 10kg and/or 23kg luggage he wants (if available).

B

bagChoice(Scanner, int, int, int, double, double, double, String, String, String, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
bagChoice Description: Taking into consideration which ticket type can cover the users needs, this method will print and available tickets with the information every ticket.
baseRate(double, double, double) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
baseRate Description: The method calculates the basic fee for the XS, S and M ticket using the XS fee as the base and adding the extra percentage for the fee Preconditions: XsRate should be a double greater than 0.

C

calcMinPrice(double, int, int, double, double) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
calcMinPrice Description: The method calculates the minimum price based on the minimum amount of luggage that is required to cover the needs of the user's estimated baggage weight additional to the base fee provided.

main(String[]) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
 
minBagNeeded(int, int, int) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
minBagNeeded Description: The method calculates the minimum amount of bags needed to fullfill the user's estimated luggage weight.

Y

yesOrNo(Scanner, String, String) - Static method in class ui.FlightCalculator
addExtraBags Description: The method creates a loop that verifies that the only valid input is "yes" or "no" and the returns the validated input.
